name: Mini Golf Magic
description:
Get ready to add some magic to your Mini Golf fun! Putt your way through wonderful 3D mini golf courses set high in the sky. The precise touch controls make it easy to pick up and play. Get to the hole with the least strokes to progress through the single-player quest or take on your Facebook friends and compete on the leaderboard!

INSTRUCTIONS - HOW TO PLAY:

Mini Golf Magic™ is easy to pick up and immediately start playing.

Goal:
• Swing your golf club and land the ball in the hole at the end of each course with the least strokes possible!

MAIN FEATURES:

• Precise Controls: Drag and release to control the strength and direction of each swing.
• Rewards Galore: Plan your course and collect the most Coins on the course to add more fun features!
• Extra Challenges: Take on the bonus goals on each course and prove your Mini Golf Wizardry.

OTHER FEATURES:

• Magical Mini Golf Adventure: Play in a whimsical and relaxing sky environment
• Hone Your Skills: Feel Yourself Improve with Every Swing!
• Quest Mode: Unlock new Mini Golf Courses with every victory.
• Power-Ups: Hit the Presents and unlock boosts like extra strokes and more.
• Compete with Friends: Play against your social media friends and compete on the leaderboard!
• Unlock Achievements to show off your Mini Golf Magic Wizardry in the Trophy Room!
• Keep Playing: Didn’t win the course? Use Coins to add swings and keep going.
• Battle Arena: Play against another player (coming soon)

Don’t wait, download the game, hit the magical courses, earn the best score, and challenge your friends!
